```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

 

```{r}
glimpse(iris)
names(iris)


ggplot(data=iris, mapping = aes( x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, col=Species)) + 
  geom_point()

ggplot(data = iris, mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_histogram()

ggplot(data = iris, mapping = aes(y = Sepal.Length, x = Species, fill=Species)) +
  geom_boxplot()

```
